arts.ttl: Kieran McKenna must consider starting Ipswich Town new boy vs Bristol City in place of goalless ace: Opinion
arts.sum: Sammie Szmodics is yet to get off the mark for Ipswich Town this season, and with Chuba Akpom lurking, Kieran McKenna has a decision to make. arts.ttl: Bristol City vs Ipswich predictions: Tractor Boys to make it three in a row
arts.sum: Ipswich are starting to click in the Championship and Elliott Bretland has confidence that they will secure an Ashton Gate victory over Bristol City on Tuesday evening.
